another day, another airport.
Foggy and cold in the morning, hot by noon. No matter what you wear in the morning, it's wrong in 3 hours.

At the airport again, my home away from home.

Watching the crazy summer traffic on PCH.

Pulled a muscle in my arm lifting a heavy suitcase. It's killing me today.
In London for two nights, my old stomping grounds.
from my deck a bright button moon hangs over the bay, its pewter flakes scattered in its wake I can only catch my breath.
Came off the road in time to get a nasty cold. Now that it's gone, I'm leaving again. Better to suffer at home than on the road.
Just got off the road, in from Bermuda, via the Virgin Islands and Portugal. I have terminal jet lag.
In Puerto Rico today. Very hot.
At the airport again. My home away from home.
Getting ready to go on the road again. All the errands always bunch up close to the time I leave.
Beautiful, sunny day. Miss my old SL450 two seater hardtop/convertible. Best car I ever had.

Leave again tomorrow. Wish someone would invent a suitcase that packs itself.
Home briefly, then out on the road again. Not complaining mind you.

Back on the road. Home in a week.

Home...but not for long!
At the airport again. Gone for only 8 days this time.
In town for 2 days, out again tomorrow. Still no bag from BA.
Got home last night sans suitcase. BA hasn't been able to locate the bag. Two words that just don't cut it anymore: remain calm.
15 days and still no luggage. Doesn't look good. May never see it again.

Had a great time appearing on the anniversary show at the comedy and magic club, hermosa beach. Lot of great comedians.
Feeling very edgy today.
Calling United airlines to try and get my expenses reimbursed after they sent my bag to London instead of Rome. Probability? Fat chance.
Cataloging blog entries to upload on my website: www.kellymonteith.com
Did my laundry & missing one sock. Maybe its mate ran off with that one shoe I always see on the highway.
Home after a month on the road. Jet lag is my life.
I'm in St. John's, Canada. Still on the road but not for much longer. Missed port in Greenland due to ice build up in the harbor!
Now I'm in Iceland, in summer clothes, but then again it's summer here. Almost 50 degrees and working on my windburn.
I'm in the Faroe Islands, east of Iceland. And I packed for summer in the Med. Who knew?
Up around Scotland now. Heading north from here.
Still on the road, in London. It's hot here and am enjoying as I have no idea of what kind of weather I'll get in the next 17 days.

I'm in London, on my way to Inverness. Will spend 3 weeks in the
Baltic and North Atlantic.
Doing what I do most often: packing.
My last tweet sounded so self-important. I fly to Europe, work through horrible jet lag, fly out 4 days later. I see hotel & airport.
Getting ready to go out on the road. Europe again.

Right now I'm not doing a damn thing.
Took a provigil. Didn't get any work done but I ran 48 miles.
Having trouble getting started today. Coffee didn't help so what's left. Provigil?
Was at a tribute show for George Carlin last night. Terrific.
Booking seats for my next flight.
Home after 20 hours of travel. Was out of "tweet" range for over a week. Flew Air France on this trip. Phew!

Home after long, long trip yesterday.
At an airport in Costa Rica, heading home.
On the road but had an interesting flight for a change.
I'm on the road again tomorrow. Out of twitter range I'm afraid.
My routine: come home, unpack, do laundry, repack, leave.
Just back home from Europe. But only for 3 days, then out again.
Have a 4 hour layover in Boston, on my way to Lisbon.
Packing for another trip. Off to Portugal tomorrow. Long, long flights.
